content.text: The table shows the distances by road, in kilometres, between some towns in New Zealand
Write down the distance between Rotorua and Hamilton
Give your answer correct to 3 decimal places
The time in Lisbon is the same as the time in Funchal
A plane left Lisbon at 08 30 and arrived in Funchal at 10 20
It then left Funchal at 12 55 and returned to Lisbon
The return journey took 15 minutes more
What time did the plane arrive in Lisbon?
The Ocean View Hotel has 300 rooms numbered from 100 to 399
A room is chosen at random
Find the probability that the room number ends in zero
A television screen size, \(S\mathrm{cm}\), is \(80\mathrm{cm}\) correct to the nearest centimetre
Complete the statement for \(S\) in the answer space
Sheila can pay her hotel bill in Euros (€) or Pounds (£)
The bill was €425 or £365 when the exchange rate was £1 = €1.14
In which currency was the bill cheaper?
Without using a calculator, show that \(3 \frac{3}{5} \div 2 \frac{1}{4} = 1 \frac{3}{5}\)
You must show each step of your working
What type of angle is angle \(AOB?\)
Find the co-ordinates of the point \(R\)
The points \(P\) and \(Q\) are marked on the grid
Huy borrowed $4500 from a bank at a rate of \(5\%\) per year compound interest
He paid back the money and interest at the end of 2 years
How much interest did he pay?
The shaded shape has rotational symmetry of order 2
Calculate, giving your answers in standard form,
Write down the size of angle \(ABC\)
On the \(1 \mathrm{cm}^2\) grid, draw an accurate net of the prism
The line \(BE\) has been drawn for you
The diagram shows a triangular prism
The results for January to June have been plotted for you
On the grid, draw the line of best fit
What type of correlation does this scatter diagram show?
On the first day of each month, a café owner records the midday temperature (°C) and the night hot meals sold
Plot the point \(B(3, 6.5)\) and draw the straight line through \(A\) and \(B\)
Write down the equation of the line in the form \(y = mx + c\)
(i) Find the gradient of the line in part (a)
On the grid, draw a line through the point (2, 5) that is perpendicular to the line in part (a).
The point \(A(1, 3.5)\) is plotted on the grid
Calculate the area of the circle
In the diagram, \(AB\) is a diameter of the circle and \(C\) is a point on the circumference
